hero.title: Create Professional Tokens in Minutes
hero.subtitle: The fastest platform to deploy secure ERC20 tokens on Polygon. No coding required.
hero.features: No coding required ‚Ä¢ Verified contracts ‚Ä¢ Professional tools

step1.title: Configure
step1.description: Define your token name, symbol, and initial supply with our intuitive interface

step2.title: Deploy
step2.description: Deploy your token to the blockchain in seconds with verified smart contracts

step3.title: Manage
step3.description: Use our professional dashboard to manage liquidity, airdrops, and community

networks.title: Multi-Chain Support
networks.subtitle: Deploy your tokens across multiple networks

guide.title: User Guide
guide.subtitle: Learn to launch and manage your token in minutes with our platform

wallet.title: Web3 Wallet
wallet.description_3: installed in your browser to interact with the blockchain.

gas.title: Gas Tokens
gas.description: You must have balance in the network's native currency to pay for transaction fees (Gas):

1.title: 1. Configuration
1.description: Define your token's identity. Choose a memorable name, a unique ticker (symbol), and set the total supply. You can also configure a custom image.

2.title: 2. Deployment
2.description: Once configured, connect your wallet and deploy the smart contract to your chosen blockchain (Polygon, BNB Chain, Ethereum). The process is automatic and secure.

3.title: 3. Management
3.description: Access your dashboard to manage your token. Here you can lock liquidity to build investor trust, renounce contract ownership, and view real-time statistics.

4.title: 4. Growth
4.description: Use integrated marketing tools. Download your token's logo, share your project on social media, and appear on our "Explore" page to gain visibility.

safe.question: Is it safe?
safe.answer: Yes, our contracts are audited and automatically verified on the blockchain.

cost.question: How much does it cost?
cost.answer: Deployment has a minimal network gas cost, plus a small platform service fee.

dashboard.noTokens: You haven't created any tokens yet

dashboard.paymentSuccess: Payment successful! You can now create tokens.

step1.title: Step 1: Define Your Token

step1.aiPlaceholder: Ex: A token to reward members of my Discord community...

step2.subtitle: Based on your idea, we've defined the following. Now, let's create a logo!
step2.name: Name:
step2.aiGenerateDesc: Let DALL-E create a unique logo based on your description.
step2.uploadDesc: Upload an image (PNG, JPG) from your device.

step3.title: Step 3: Configuration and Launch
step3.subtitle: Define the supply and select the network.

admin.title: Danger Zone / Admin
admin.notOwnerWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è You are not connected with the contract owner account. You cannot execute these actions.
admin.transferDesc: Transfer contract control to another wallet. Irreversible if you make a mistake.
admin.renounceDesc: No one will be able to control the contract ever again. Required for 'community tokens'.
admin.communityNote: If you abandon ownership, the token will be governed by the community (or no one).
admin.renounceCommunityDesc: No one will be able to control the contract ever again. Required for 'community tokens'. If you abandon ownership, the token will be governed by the community (or no one).
admin.autoVerificationDesc: Connect with PolygonScan to verify in 1 click. You need a free API Key.
admin.manualNoApiKey: If you don't have an API Key, download the code and upload it manually.
